name: Holy Prism
description:
Fires a beam of light that scatters to strike a clump of targets. 

If the beam is aimed at an enemy target, it deals 4,043 Holy damage and radiates 3,805 healing to 5 allies within 15 yards.

If the beam is aimed at a friendly target, it heals for 7,687 and radiates 2,504 Holy damage to 5 enemies within 15 yards.
